alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Pettis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 7:33PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pettis and southeastern Johnson Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 732 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Whiteman Afb, or near Whiteman Air Force Base, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sedalia, Knob Noster, Whiteman Air Force Base, La Monte, Green Ridge, Whiteman Afb and Sedalia Memorial Arpt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central and west central Missouri.
